name: Button Playground
description:
Button Playground is a game of testing and experimenting with objects and commands.

The game is averagely updated (nearly every month), and here you will get the (most likely) ONE WEEK EARLY BUILDS.

Version 4 is here!

All Commands:

For Circle//Scale

For Circle//Texture

For Circle//None

For Circle//Size Up

For Circle//Size Down

For Circle//Random Position

Background//BG Change

For Circle//Textures//WAB

For Circle//Textures//Normal
